rx.broadcast

Interface Broadcast

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    InMemoryBroadcast, UdpBroadcast

    public interface Broadcast
    A Broadcast represents both a producer and subscriber of messages.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Observable<Void> send(@NotNull Object value)
      Broadcasts the given value when the returned Observable is subscribed to.
      <T> Observable<T> valuesOfType(@NotNull Class<T> clazz)
      Returns a (hot) Observable stream of broadcasted values.

    • Method Detail

      • send

        @Contract(pure=true)
Observable<Void> send(@NotNull
                                           @NotNull Object value)
        Broadcasts the given value when the returned Observable is subscribed to.
        Parameters:
        value - the value to broadcast
        Returns:
        an Observable stream representing the message sent status

      • valuesOfType

        @Contract(pure=true)
<T> Observable<T> valuesOfType(@NotNull
                                                    @NotNull Class<T> clazz)
        Returns a (hot) Observable stream of broadcasted values.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the output stream type
        Parameters:
        clazz - the class type to filter the broadcasted values by
        Returns:
        an Observable stream of broadcasted values
